quote: There's a little known virtue called magnificence: an unostentatious liberality of expenditure in doing good. You would deny me the practice of it. Mierda! I should have left you on the comet.
quote_letters: THERES A LITTLE KNOWN VIRTUE CALLED MAGNIFICENCE AN UNOSTENTATIOUS LIBERALITY OF EXPENDITURE IN DOING GOOD YOU WOULD DENY ME THE PRACTICE OF IT MIERDA I SHOULD HAVE LEFT YOU ON THE COMET
